headline: Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd (CRDO) Draws Attention Amid Analyst Coverage and Industry Developments
summary: Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd (NASDAQ:CRDO) is one of the stocks with huge growth potential, according to the media. On January 22, Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd (NASDAQ:CRDO) entered into a patent license and mutual covenant agreement with 3M Company. The agreement covers active electrical cable technology, as Credo is to license certain patents to […]

headline: 3M Company (MMM) Was “Wildly Misjudged,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published Jim Cramer Discussed Trump, CEOs & These 10 Stocks. 3M Company (NYSE:MMM)is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed. 3M Company (NYSE:MMM) is one of the largest industrial conglomerates in the world. The shares are up by a modest 1.28% over the past year and down by 3.4% year-to-date. Banking giant JPMorgan […]

headline: 3M Overhaul Resets Portfolio Mix And Offers Potential Valuation Upside
summary: 3M (NYSE:MMM) is rolling out broad business transformation programs that focus on commercial excellence and a higher volume of new product launches. The company plans to reduce its factory and distribution center footprint as part of an efficiency push. Management is also evaluating the potential divestiture of about 10% of the business, signaling a shift in the company’s portfolio mix. For a diversified industrial like 3M, these moves touch almost every part of how the company operates and...
